reviews.review: Mola
THAT GAME IS JUST AWESOME!!! It is THE best FPS! :DDD

This Game You could say, is and will always be the holy grail of gaming. one thing i wan't to say first is that don't even bother reading the negitive reviews, they're a bunch of bull****.They often say the game was boring or the graphics were horrible, but that is nowhere near the truth. This is a game that defines streamline story telling and gameplay. The game has a silent protaganist who often is reminded of his past, Though i would recomend getting Half Life one if you want to keep track of whats going on. This game is rich with lovable characters who you will care about, you know why, because the facial expressions and body animation are Lost arts! No current game designer has even come close to Valves character building and streamline gameplay. There are no cutscenes (for some reason i've heard people complaine about non exsistant cut scenes.)The graphics were absolutly fine for the time and still are. and the gameplay is brilliant! With fast paced action and great level design you cant go wrong! If i haven't convinced you already,well, your brain dead. I'd Recomend this game to anyone who plays video games.
Great game all time classic, with the additional bonus of great mods and expansion games. Would reccomend this game to all gamers.
Got this for $1. Worth the $1. Play it if you haven't.

Hlaf life 2 is an amazing game. Unfortunately the game ends too soon. 
Waiting for Valve to make a third one. :p

Este es un juego realmente bueno y tiene una muy buena historia esta genial su jugabilidad. Pero si buscan un simple normal y aburrido shooter este no es lo que buscan. al contrario, si buscan un juego con historia, jugabilidad y muchotiempo de diversion este es para ustedes
This game is very fun, the story keeps you interested and engaged
Buy this game immediately.
Apenas o melhor FPS já feito em toda humanidade, não tive remorso de comprar-lo

Picked this one up for a really good price. It is iconic for FPS games, so I thought I would give it a shot. Considering how old this game is, I was very impressed. I did not expect it to be so good. The graphics are still fairly decent and the controls ran smoothly. The plot was OK. It was a little slow drawn out. I know this is typical for standard FPS games, but I thought I would throw that one out there. From what I can tell, the story was a little better in the first one, but it was still fine here. Over all, a good game. If you like older FPS games than give it a try.
Probably my favourite series.

What a game, this game is very amazing. The graphics were really well. Very fun to play. Ravenholm creeped me out though, very wide open gameplay huge objectives so you never get bored. So great that I give this game 10/10 Valve put all the effort into this one. Just an amazing, intriguing, action packed game, hard to find one like this so get it while it's hot!

Ok, lets start by saying that this game is art. You must stare at the art, then play with it. When you're done, try it again and play with it in new ways. That art, is one of the most fun game you have ever played. From the Fanboat part of the art, (One of the best parts) to the story part of it. (Then to zombie killing.) It's amazing, they just need Half Life 3. But besides that, there's still a lot of mods you can play with afterwards. Such as ''The Stanley Parable"(Yes, it's a mod. Mod first, game later. That good.) and Zombie Panic!: Source. I Highly recommend this game, or art. :D

Ayant entendu les nombreuses éloges faites à ce jeux, j'ai pas hésité à l'acheter :). J'avais déjà apprécié le premier volet en jouant à Black Mesa, pour ce qui est de sa difficulté et de son ambiance, du coup j'esperai quelque chose d'encore mieux avec ce nouvel Half life, vu qu'il y a un "2" dans le titre !

Donc, par où commencer ?
Et bien par ce qui m'a déçu, car en générale c'est ce qui saute aux yeux, et puis comme ça on terminera sur les bons points ! Je commence par l'ambiance: J'avais aimé l'ambiance du premier (souterrain, centrale nucléaire, laboratoire), mais j'ai eu du mal à accrocher à l'ambiance de celui-ci :/ les décors "Europe de l'Est" c'est surement mieux adaptés à des jeux styles STALKER ou metro. J'aurais préféré un design plus futuriste, mais ce n'est que mon avis et non un défaut du jeu.
Le jeu est plus facile que je l'espérais, il n'y a plus beaucoup de séquence de recherche ou de plateforme assez hardu qu'on retrouvait dans le premier, séquences à s'arracher les cheveux (quand même !) mais qui offrent une grande satisfaction une fois réussie. Ici les gunfights sont plus mis en avant, ainsi que les conduites de véhicules, qui là encore de mon avis ne sont pas si passionnantes ^^'
Néamoins, le jeu est bon !
Oui il l'ait, je l'ai commencé en 2013, alors qu'il n'est sorti qu'en 2004 et je peux vous dire qu'il offre de très belles mises en scène malgré son âge. C'était un plaisir de voir la Gestapo débouler dans les appartements des citoyens, de voir les "Striders" en action, ainsi que les véhicules aériens ennemis.
De plus on a un gameplay intelligent, il est varié et dynamique; Entre les differents types d'ennemis, les differents armes à dispositions et comment le level design qui combine certains de ces éléments en particulier, on a de quoi se satisfaire pleinement ! Le jeu est varié, et offre une expérience compléte pour tous passionnés de FPS.
Enfin, en ce qui concerne le scénario, il ne m'a pas vraiment marqué, c'est du classique ne vous attendez pas à grand chose de ce côté là;

Pour finir, j'ai dis ne pas avoir aimé l'ambiance générale du jeu, mais néamoins mansion spéciale à l'ambiance du dernier niveau ^^
люблю эту игру
This is a very well made game. while having a little bad graphics, it has an exquisite storyline, and it lets yiu use a machine that lets you reverse gravity on them!

Bought this game because how highly regarded its always been
this game is in just about every "top PC games ever made" list 
but honestly i dont know what the hell the fuss was all about
the graphics looks like shit, they have not aged well, the environment looks decent but the models of the characters is so ugly 
the main problem is the game play tho
idk maybe ive just been spoiled with good shooters physics by playing Bioshock and Dead Space where every shot u land had an impact and feel to it, the enemies responded the way they should and the controls had a weight to it
after playing that and coming to this i cant stand the way the game feel
your character feel like he has no weight whatsoever and enemies just die like theyre made of paper and plastic instead of flesh
maybe this game was good for its time but it did not age well

+ Various Combines (Prison Guard, Metrocop...)
+ GMan (watch all your steps, from the beggining to the end)

As the follow on for one of the greatest games ever created on PC, Half-Life 2 had some pretty enormous boots to fill. It was like the cobbler was paid a fortune and spent a lifetime on it. Whilst I still believe the first game to be superior based on when it was released, the gap is minor, and I can see why gamers who came on to the scene around 2004 onwards would prefer it to the original. The episodes provide a fantastic time filler while we await, what could well be the greatest game of all time if it is ever released, Half-Life 3. Come on Valve, show us that you still care about the original community that you built this empire upon.

This is a great game 9/10
P.S. I would recommend buying half life complete now that it does down to crazy prices! Make sure you play them in this order:
Half Life Source, Half Life Opposing Forces, Half Life Blue Shift, Half Life 2, HL2 Episode 1, HL2 Episode 2

opposing forces and blue shift aren't key to the story but thats chronological order
And remember half life and half life 2 are completely different stories they just have the same main character

Having played the original Half Life when I was around 11, I was hyped to hear that a sequel was coming out. This game superseded all other RPG shooter games at the time, This is mainly due to its amazing engine and graphics that even today I would still consider pleasing to the eyes. Now hurry up Valve and release HL3!!! :) P.S Its a Sci Fi genre.

Сложно объяснить какие чувства у меня связаны с этой замечательной игрой.Даже спустя столько лет в 2013,почти в 2014 году заходя в нее я получаю удовольствие от игры. Атмосфера,гейплей,графическая составляющая,все на высочайшем уровне.Отдельно нужно сказать и про музыку,саундтрек просто волшебный,огромное спасибо Kelly Bailey,за то что он создал это чудо,по другому это назвать нельзя.
Half-Life захватила меня в далеком 2002 году,Valve в 1998 году выпустили шедевр игровой индустрии,в 2004 они продолжили. Огромное спасибо вам Valve за это чудо. 10 из 10.
SUpimpa

Ничто так не радет как старушка Half-Life. Это именно то с чего я начал осознанно воспринимать игры. Чего стоят харизатичность героев, что встречаются на пути у Гордона, например отец Григорий с его безумным и отчаявшимся от бессилия смеха, ведущяя двойную игру профессор Моссман. И самое главное, что меня зацепило, это главный Антогонист части - Уолес Брин. Вот кто по настоящему заставляет себя ненавидеть, так это именно он, ни интриги Алекс, ни предателство Моссман ни попадают не под какое сравнение.

An excellent game in the series. If you never played Half-Life(The original game that started it all), you still won't feel left out with how the storyline is produced. I see very few bugs and issues and the plot twist took me by surprise(Spoilers ;)) Now if you will excuse me I have math to add up to.... half-life 1 plus half-life 2 equals half-life 3!!! :o Half life 3 confirmed :p

I joined the party a little late with this game, both in terms of enjoyment and playing the game itself. 

The first time I played the game was a little over 2 years ago and hated it. A few weeks ago, after downloading steam on a new computer, I was able to boost the graphics to the highest (which isn't too difficult) and still getting high frame rates. More than that, I weirdly enjoyed the game a whole bunch. I think it comes from a place of being a more mature player and one that played the game without any hype knowing that I didn't really like it some years ago...

So yeah, it's a crazy good game that I have not yet finished but know that I want to play it again when I am done.
Super gameska! :)
